sage.scripting

Interface IScriptManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ScriptManager

    public interface IScriptManager
    The IScriptManager interface exposes the public methods that all Script Managers must implement.
    Author:
    Kenneth Barnett

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addScript(IScript script)
      Adds the specified IScript to the ScriptManager's collection of scripts if the script is not null.
      BehaviorScript createBehaviorScript(java.lang.String filename)
      Returns a BehaviorScript created using the script specified by filename
      DataScript createDataScript(java.lang.String filename)
      Returns a DataScript created using the script specified by filename
      boolean generateBehaviorScript(java.lang.String path, java.lang.String name)
      Creates a script file that contains the needed functions to be considered a behavior script.
      javax.script.ScriptEngine getEngine()
      Returns the script engine (interpreter) that the script manager uses.
      javax.script.Invocable getInvocableEngine()
      Returns the script engine (interpreter) that the script manager uses cast as an Invocable.
      boolean getIsActive()
      Returns TRUE if the script manager is initialized and ready to function; FALSE otherwise.
      void removeScript(IScript script)
      Removes the specified IScript from the ScriptManager's collection of scripts.
      void update(float time)
      Updates all the BehaviorScript scripts registered with the ScriptManager by calling their update() function.
      boolean validateBehaviorScript(BehaviorScript file)
      This method scans through the script file to see if it contains the init() and the update() functions which are functions that a behavior script are required to have.

    • Method Detail

      • getIsActive

        boolean getIsActive()
        Returns TRUE if the script manager is initialized and ready to function; FALSE otherwise.

      • getEngine

        javax.script.ScriptEngine getEngine()
        Returns the script engine (interpreter) that the script manager uses.

      • getInvocableEngine

        javax.script.Invocable getInvocableEngine()
        Returns the script engine (interpreter) that the script manager uses cast as an Invocable.

      • createDataScript

        DataScript createDataScript(java.lang.String filename)
        Returns a DataScript created using the script specified by filename
        Parameters:
        filename - - The path + name of the script file (WITHOUT the file extension).

      • createBehaviorScript

        BehaviorScript createBehaviorScript(java.lang.String filename)
        Returns a BehaviorScript created using the script specified by filename
        Parameters:
        filename - - The path + name of the script file (WITHOUT the file extension).

      • generateBehaviorScript

        boolean generateBehaviorScript(java.lang.String path,
                               java.lang.String name)
        Creates a script file that contains the needed functions to be considered a behavior script. The functions are init() and update().
        Parameters:
        path - - The path to the directory the script file is to be saved to.
        name - - The name of the script file WITHOUT the file extension.
        Returns:
        TRUE if the script file was successfully created; FALSE otherwise.

      • validateBehaviorScript

        boolean validateBehaviorScript(BehaviorScript file)
        This method scans through the script file to see if it contains the init() and the update() functions which are functions that a behavior script are required to have.
        Parameters:
        file - - The BehaviorScript to scan through.
        Returns:
        TRUE if the file is a valid behavior script; FALSE otherwise.

      • addScript

        void addScript(IScript script)
        Adds the specified IScript to the ScriptManager's collection of scripts if the script is not null.

      • removeScript

        void removeScript(IScript script)
        Removes the specified IScript from the ScriptManager's collection of scripts.

      • update

        void update(float time)
        Updates all the BehaviorScript scripts registered with the ScriptManager by calling their update() function.
